entry.title: Public key and signature malleability
entry.summary: In the given context, Gavin Andresen expresses his strong support for more precisely defining the transaction validity rules by changing the reference implementation. He seeks objections, if any, from other transaction-validating implementations. The email also includes a promotion for AppDynamics Lite to make web apps faster. Lastly, it includes information about the Bitcoin-development mailing list and its subscription link.
